headline: How Recent Developments Are Reshaping The Xcel Energy Investment Story
summary: Xcel Energy’s fair value estimate has been nudged down from about $88.35 to $87.53 per share, even as Wall Street commentary has turned more constructive on the utility’s long term growth story. Behind this modest recalibration is a balancing act between a stronger revenue growth outlook and a risk environment that remains essentially unchanged at a 6.96% discount rate. As the Street digests shifting legal, regulatory, and macro signals, investors will want to follow how this evolving...
